mapper.insert: insert into cart_item(member_id, item_id, count) values (#{memberId}, #{itemId}, #{count})
mapper.select: select ci.cart_item_id, ci.item_id, ci.count, i.name, concat(ii.paths, ii.img_name) as img_path from cart_item ci inner join item i on ci.item_id = i.item_id inner join item_img ii on i.item_id = ii.item_id where cart_item_id = #{cartItemId}

select ci.cart_item_id, i.name as item_name, i.price, ci.count, ii.img_name from cart_item ci inner join item i on ci.item_id = i.item_id inner join item_img ii on i.item_id = ii.item_id where ci.member_id = #{memberId} order by ci.cart_item_id desc
